# Exploratory data analysis

Model formula:
$$
y_i \sim{} \mathcal{N}(\mu_i, \sigma^2)\\
\mu_i =\beta_0 + f(x_i)\\
f(x_i) = \sum^k_{j=1}{b_j(x_i)\beta_j}
$$

where $\beta_0$ is the y-intercept, and $f(x)$ indicates an additive smoothing function of $x$.
